statements: DELETE FROM Recipes WHERE origin_country = 'Italy' AND creator = 'Chef Giovanni'
DELETE FROM RecipeOrigin WHERE recipe_id = 1 AND origin_country = 'Italy';
DELETE FROM RecipeHistory WHERE recipe_id = (SELECT recipe_id FROM RecipeOrigin WHERE recipe_name = 'Spaghetti Carbonara') AND event_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Recipe WHERE recipe_id = 5 AND origin_country = 'Italy';
DELETE FROM Ingredient WHERE category = 'Dairy' AND source_origin = 'France';
